snippet.title: Touhou 10: Mountain of Faith - Final Stage (No Commentary)
snippet.description:
Ah, the God of Wind on the Grounds of the Divine Lake 

Now we're at the final stage. Not much to really write home about here, it's short but it makes up for that in intensity and like prior stages you really need to know where to move to keep enemy bullets from filling the screen. Illusion Laser REALLY earns its keep in this stage. No mid boss for this stage oddly enough, another first since the PC-98 days, Sanae must be slacking.

Kanako is tough but that's expected of a final boss. If I were to give her a theme like other final bosses I would say "overpowering" all her attacks come at you fast and hard forcing you to make many last minute quick decisions on the fly leaving you no time to prepare. Some of her attacks are acually similar to Sanae's except better, in all cases having the same level of condensed bullets while requiring you to move much faster. The biggest trouble with her is when she abuses her god abilities into her spells such as changing the size of bullets at the last second or even better making herself intangible temporarily. But as long as you can keep up with her ferocious barrage of attacks you'll pull out ahead.

Difficulty - Normal
Character - Marisa-B
Stage 6 - The Wind God's Lake  
BGM - Cemetery of Onbashira ~ Grave of Being  
Boss - The Avatar of Mountains and Lakes: Kanako Yasaka  
BGM - The Venerable Ancient Battlefield ~ Suwa Foughten Field 

Spell Cards

3:07 - Cool Down
3:18 - Divine Festival "Expanded Onbashira" 
3:46 - Cool Down
4:04 - Rice Porridge in Tube "God's Rice Porridge" 
4:21 - Cool Down
4:33 - Sacrifice Sign "Misayama Hunting Shrine Ritual" 
4:58 - Cool Down (particularly cruel cool down...)
5:57 - Heaven's Stream "Miracle of Otensui" 
6:19 - "Mountain of Faith" 

Translation's courtesy of the Touhou wiki
